features.name: Challenge
features.desc:
Once per day, a cavalier can challenge a foe to combat. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, the cavalier chooses one target within sight to challenge. The cavalier's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} deal extra {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are made against the target of his challenge. This extra damage is equal to the cavalier's level. The cavalier can use this ability once per day at 1st level, plus one additional time per day for every three levels beyond 1st, to a maximum of seven times per day at 19th level.
Challenging a foe requires much of the cavalier's {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration{/g}. The cavalier takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to his {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}, except against attacks made by the target of his challenge.
The challenge remains in effect until the target is dead or {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g} or until the combat ends. Each cavalier's challenge also includes another effect which is listed in the section describing the cavalier's order.

features.name: Order
features.desc: At 1st level, a cavalier must pledge himself to a specific order. The order grants the cavalier a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}, class {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special abilities{/g}.

features.name: Tactician
features.desc: At 1st level, a cavalier receives a teamwork {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} as a bonus feat. He must meet the prerequisites for this feat. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the cavalier can grant his teamwork feat to all allies within 30 feet who can see and hear him. Allies retain the use of this bonus feat for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} plus 1 round for every two levels the cavalier possesses. Allies do not need to meet the prerequisites of these bonus feats. The cavalier can use this ability once per day at 1st level, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels thereafter.

features.name: Tactician — Bonus Feat
features.desc: At 1st level, a cavalier receives a teamwork {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} as a bonus feat. He must meet the prerequisites for this feat. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, the cavalier can grant his teamwork feat to all allies within 30 feet who can see and hear him. Allies retain the use of this bonus feat for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} plus 1 round for every two levels the cavalier possesses. Allies do not need to meet the prerequisites of these bonus feats. The cavalier can use this ability once per day at 1st level, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels thereafter.

features.name: Animal Companion
features.desc: Unlike normal animals of its kind, an animal companion's {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g}, abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} advance as the druid advances in level. If a character receives an animal companion from more than one source, her effective druid levels stack for the purposes of determining the statistics and abilities of the companion. Most animal companions increase in {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} when their druid reaches 4th or 7th level, depending on the companion.

features.name: Weapon and Armor Proficiency
features.desc: Cavaliers are proficient with all simple and {g|Encyclopedia:Weapon_Proficiency}martial weapons{/g}, with all types of armor (heavy, light, and medium) and with shields (except tower shields).

features.name: Cavalier's Charge
features.desc: At 3rd level, a cavalier learns to make more accurate charge {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} while mounted. The cavalier receives a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} on a charge while mounted (instead of the normal +2). In addition, the cavalier does not suffer any {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to his {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} after making a charge attack while mounted.

features.name: Banner
features.desc: At 5th level, a cavalier's banner becomes a symbol of inspiration to his allies and companions. As long as the cavalier's banner is clearly visible, all allies within 60 feet receive a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fear and a +1 morale bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} made as part of a charge. At 10th level, and every five levels thereafter, these bonuses increase by +1.

features.name: Bonus Feat
features.desc: At 6th level, and at every six levels thereafter, a cavalier gains a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} in addition to those gained from normal advancement. These bonus feats must be selected from those listed as combat feats. The cavalier must meet the prerequisites of these bonus feats.

features.name: Greater Tactician
features.desc: At 9th level, the cavalier receives an additional teamwork {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} as a bonus feat. He must meet the prerequisites for this feat. Using the tactician ability is a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.

features.name: Mighty Charge
features.desc: At 11th level, a cavalier learns to make devastating charge {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} while mounted. Double the threat range of any weapons wielded during a charge while mounted. This increase does not stack with other effects that increase the threat range of the weapon. In addition, the cavalier can make a free bull rush and trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} if his charge attack is successful. These free combat maneuvers do not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}.

features.name: Demanding Challenge
features.desc: At 12th level, whenever a cavalier declares a challenge, his target must pay attention to the threat he poses. As long as the target is within the {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatened area{/g} of the cavalier, it takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made by anyone other than the cavalier.

features.name: Greater Banner
features.desc: At 14th level, the cavalier's banner becomes a rallying call to his allies. All allies within 60 feet receive a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against charm and compulsion {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and effects.

features.name: Supreme Charge
features.desc: At 20th level, whenever the cavalier makes a charge {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} while mounted, he deals double the normal amount of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (or triple if using a lance). In addition, if the cavalier confirms a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} on a charge attack while mounted, the target is stunned for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. A {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} reduces this to staggered for 1d4 rounds. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is equal to 10 + the cavalier's {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g}.
